name: Appointfix
0:
”Alexa, ask Appointfix to create an appointment with Dave Smith”
”Alexa, ask Appointfix when is my next appointment with Dave Smith”
”Alexa, ask Appointfix what's on my schedule”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: appointfix
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Appointfix is the modern appointment book that helps you easily schedule appointments and reduce no-shows using automated text reminders. 

Ask Alexa what’s on your schedule, when is your next appointment with a certain client or even create a new appointment.
